<!-- 1. Log in to that site as an administrator. -->
<!-- 2. Go to Tools: Import in the WordPress admin panel. -->
<!-- 3. Install the "WordPress" importer from the list. -->
<!-- 4. Activate & Run Importer. -->

<!-- 6. You will first be asked to map the authors in this export file to users -->
<!--    on the site. For each author, you may choose to map to an -->
<!--    existing user on the site or to create a new user. -->
<!-- 7. WordPress will then import each of the posts, pages, comments, categories, etc. -->

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_attachment_metadata]]></wp:meta_key>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_attachment_metadata]]></wp:meta_key>

		<title></title>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_attachment_metadata]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:5:{s:5:"width";i:91;s:6:"height";i:92;s:4:"file";s:30:"2020/12/circle_with_pack-1.png";s:5:"sizes";a:0:{}s:10:"image_meta";a:12:{s:8:"aperture";s:1:"0";s:6:"credit";s:0:"";s:6:"camera";s:0:"";s:7:"caption";s:0:"";s:17:"created_timestamp";s:1:"0";s:9:"copyright";s:0:"";s:12:"focal_length";s:1:"0";s:3:"iso";s:1:"0";s:13:"shutter_speed";s:1:"0";s:5:"title";s:0:"";s:11:"orientation";s:1:"0";s:8:"keywords";a:0:{}}}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>annual_death</title>

					<item>
		<title>Annual Deaths</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/annual-deaths/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 02 Dec 2020 18:48:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1372</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size"><strong>Smoking Attributed Deaths by Gender and Disease in South Africa, 2016</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1600,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/pie-1024x525.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1600"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1372</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-02 18:48:58]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-02 18:48:58]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[annual-deaths]]></wp:post_name>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Ailments Caused by Smoking Cigarettes</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/ailments-caused-by-smoking-cigarettes/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Dec 2020 02:43:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1396</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:ai/ai-block {"src":"https://tobacco.dgstg.org/#/en/infographics/body","width":"","height":""} /-->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-intermediate-font-size"><br><strong>Ailments specific to gender</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1602,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image is-style-rounded"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/men.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1602"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":40} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:40%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"light-blue"} -->
<p class="has-light-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Erectile dysfunction</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1603,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/women.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1603"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":40} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:40%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Cervix cancer</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Ectopic pregnancy</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Reduced fertility</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Maternal smoking while pregnant can cause birth </strong> <strong>defects - cleft palates</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Nicotine exposure to fetus can have adverse consequences for brain development</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Preterm delivery and stillbirth</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-intermediate-font-size"><br><strong>Ailments specific to gender</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1602,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image is-style-rounded"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/men.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1602"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":40} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:40%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"light-blue"} -->
<p class="has-light-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Erectile dysfunction</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1603,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/women.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1603"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":40} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:40%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Ectopic pregnancy</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Reduced fertility</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Maternal smoking while pregnant can cause birth </strong> <strong>defects - cleft palates</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Nicotine exposure to fetus can have adverse consequences for brain development</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color"><strong>Preterm delivery and stillbirth</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="health_category" nicename="ailments"><![CDATA[Ailments]]></category>
		<category domain="health_category" nicename="use"><![CDATA[Use]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inline_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_oembed_a7ca03786e295dc81b2e0fe367e70f56]]></wp:meta_key>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>2016 Costs</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/1403/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Dec 2020 02:59:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1403</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>In 2016</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":6.6} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:6.6%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1605,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/people.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1605"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":27.3} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:27.3%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"cost-gender-label","textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="cost-gender-label has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">209,275 South Africans</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":5} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:5%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1606,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/small_men.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1606"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":15.3} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:15.3%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"cost-gender-label","textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="cost-gender-label has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">138,738 men</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":5} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:5%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1607,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/small_women.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1607"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","className":"cost-gender-label","textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left cost-gender-label has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">70,537 women</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>were admitted into hospital due to smoking related diseases.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":57.6} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:57.6%"><!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">Tobacco related illnesses cost the South African economy</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"huge"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-huge-font-size">R42 billion</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="tight has-normal-font-size">including R14 billion in direct healthcare costs*.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">But the tobacco industry only paid</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"huge"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-huge-font-size">R12 billion</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="tight has-normal-font-size">in excise tax.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1609,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/cost_info.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1609"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>* The R42 billion includes direct healthcare costs, productivity loss due to illness and the loss of potential earnings by those who died early due to tobacco. This is calculated&nbsp; using average earnings in South Africa and taking unemployment rates for men and women into account. The R14 billion reflects approximately 4.1% of overall healthcare expenditure.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>In 2016</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":6.6} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:6.6%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1605,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/people.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1605"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":27.3} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:27.3%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">209,275 South Africans</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":5} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:5%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1606,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/small_men.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1606"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":15.3} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:15.3%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">138,738 men</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":5} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:5%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1607,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/small_women.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1607"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">70,537 women</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>were admitted into hospital due to smoking related diseases.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":57.6} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:57.6%"><!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">Tobacco related illnesses cost the South African economy</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"huge"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-huge-font-size">R42 billion</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="tight has-normal-font-size">including R14 billion in direct healthcare costs*.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">But the tobacco industry only paid</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","textColor":"green","fontSize":"huge"} -->
<p class="tight has-green-color has-text-color has-huge-font-size">R12 billion</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"tight","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="tight has-normal-font-size">in excise tax.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1609,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/cost_info.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1609"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-small-font-size">*The R42 billion includes direct healthcare costs, productivity loss due to illness and the loss of potential earnings by those who died early due to tobacco. This is calculated  using average earnings in South Africa and taking unemployment rates for men and women into account. The R14 billion reflects approximately 4.1% of overall healthcare expenditure.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1403</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-03 02:59:53]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-03 02:59:53]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[1403]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="health_category" nicename="cost"><![CDATA[Cost]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inline_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Children</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/children/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Dec 2020 03:36:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1445</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":19.9} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:19.9%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1593,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/sample.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1593"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Children are more at risk from the effects of secondhand smoke than adults.&nbsp;Their developing respiratory tract is generally more sensitive to environmental pollutants and they have higher breathing frequency and inhale more air per body volume than adults. There are also age-related differences in liver metabolism and clearance rates.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Exposure to smoke by mother</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Before birth:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Reduced birth weight<br>Sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS)<br>Nicotine exposure to fetus can have adverse consequences for brain development (if mother smokes or is exposed to secondhand smoke)</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After birth:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS)</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Lower respiratory illnesses</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Middle ear infections</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Cough, phlegm, wheeze and breathlessness</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Asthma</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Lower level of lung function</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[adults]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_oembed_9581e6f8308563fc560f40ad687b022e]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_oembed_time_9581e6f8308563fc560f40ad687b022e]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1607521036]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Adults</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/adults/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Dec 2020 03:50:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1456</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":60} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:60%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1591,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/image_secondhand_adults.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1591"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">In Adults, secondhand smoke causes increased risk of developing lung cancer by 20-30%. People with heart disease are particularly at risk from secondhand smoke.  Even brief exposure can trigger heart attacks.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color"><strong>Lung cancer<br>Respiratory tract injury<br>Thrombosis (blood clots)<br>Heart disease<br>Nasal irritation<br>Impaired functioning of the lining of blood vessels<br>Stroke</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1456</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-03 03:50:14]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-03 03:50:14]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[adults]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Small amounts of exposure to secondhand smoke is harmless.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/small-amounts-of-exposure-to-secondhand-smoke-is-harmless/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 04 Dec 2020 12:02:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1475</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Small amounts of exposure to secondhand smoke is harmless.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size" id="block-6edca7c4-9a64-4526-ab72-a65937ff023e">There is no risk-free level of exposure to secondhand smoke. Exposure to secondhand smoke can cause sudden blood clots and heart attacks, and strokes can be triggered by tobacco smoke. Brief exposure can trigger asthma attacks in children.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1475</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-04 12:02:41]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-04 12:02:41]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[small-amounts-of-exposure-to-secondhand-smoke-is-harmless]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="health_category" nicename="second-hand-myths"><![CDATA[Secondhand Myths]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Smoking out of a window or near an extractor fan will protect others in the room from secondhand smoke.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/smoking-out-of-a-window-or-near-an-extractor-fan-will-protect-others-in-the-room-from-secondhand-smoke/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 04 Nov 2020 12:04:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1477</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Smoking out of a window or near an extractor fan will protect others in the room from secondhand smoke.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">Smoke from one cigarette can linger in a room for up to two and a half hours, even with a window open.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Symptoms</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/symptoms/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 10 Dec 2020 20:30:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1551</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1589,"width":677,"height":504,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-full is-resized"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/image-16.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1589" width="677" height="504"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":32.1} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:32.1%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size"><strong>Symptoms appear within 1 day of exposure and will last between 1 - 3 days.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size"><strong>Common Symptoms</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">• Nausea<br>• Vomiting<br>• Dizziness<br>• Headaches</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size"><strong>Other Symptoms</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">• Difficulty eating<br>• Difficulty sleeping<br>• Weakness<br>• Abdominal cramps<br>• Shortness of breath<br>• Fluctuations  in blood pressure<br>   and heart rate<br>• Pallor (unhealthy/pale/ashy<br>   appearance)<br>• Diarrhea<br>• Chills<br>• Increased perspiration and saliva</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[symptoms]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>annual_death_women</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/annual-deaths-2/annual_death_women/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 21 Dec 2020 12:31:44 +0000</pubDate>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_attachment_metadata]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:5:{s:5:"width";i:1024;s:6:"height";i:528;s:4:"file";s:30:"2020/12/annual_death_men-1.png";s:5:"sizes";a:3:{s:6:"medium";a:4:{s:4:"file";s:30:"annual_death_men-1-300x155.png";s:5:"width";i:300;s:6:"height";i:155;s:9:"mime-type";s:9:"image/png";}s:9:"thumbnail";a:4:{s:4:"file";s:30:"annual_death_men-1-150x150.png";s:5:"width";i:150;s:6:"height";i:150;s:9:"mime-type";s:9:"image/png";}s:12:"medium_large";a:4:{s:4:"file";s:30:"annual_death_men-1-768x396.png";s:5:"width";i:768;s:6:"height";i:396;s:9:"mime-type";s:9:"image/png";}}s:10:"image_meta";a:12:{s:8:"aperture";s:1:"0";s:6:"credit";s:0:"";s:6:"camera";s:0:"";s:7:"caption";s:0:"";s:17:"created_timestamp";s:1:"0";s:9:"copyright";s:0:"";s:12:"focal_length";s:1:"0";s:3:"iso";s:1:"0";s:13:"shutter_speed";s:1:"0";s:5:"title";s:0:"";s:11:"orientation";s:1:"0";s:8:"keywords";a:0:{}}}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>

					<item>
		<title>Illicit Import / Export</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/import/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 09 Oct 2020 13:01:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=438</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-green-color">Smuggling</span></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color">Illegally traded across borders without paying taxes. Both legal and illegal products are smuggled.&nbsp; Tobacco products are brought into the country at both legal and illegal entry points without paying import duties. These are sold without paying excise duties or VAT. These products may not meet health or other legal requirements.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-green-color">Bootlegging</span></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color">Small scale smuggling where an individual purchases cigarettes in one county where taxes are low, and sold in another country where taxes are higher</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-green-color">In transit</span></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color">Tobacco products are produced for export by a legitimate manufacturer but are smuggled to a different country en-route without paying any tax.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>810</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-09 13:01:44]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-09 13:01:44]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[import]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="types-supply"><![CDATA[Types / Tobacco Supply]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1169]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Combating - Implement a track and trace system</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/combating-strengthen-enforcement/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 15 Oct 2020 14:13:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=511</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":538,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/combating_icon_b.png" alt="" class="wp-image-538"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-large-font-size"><strong>Implement a Track and Trace System</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center">Track and Trace is an essential system in reducing illicit trade and increasing tax revenue</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size"><strong>Track and trace technology has been successful in various countries in reducing illicit trade and increasing tax revenue.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size">Track and trace is an essential system that allows monitoring of the real-time movement of tobacco products from production or import to retail sales in order to reduce illicit activity through unique, non-removable codes or stamps on tobacco packaging. &nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size">‘<strong>Tracking</strong>’ makes it mandatory for all supply-chain operators to scan tobacco products, identifying their location. This allows real-time monitoring through the supply chain from manufacturer to retailer. Successful tracking needs to be accompanied by strict enforcement to ensure success.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size">‘<strong>Tracing</strong>’ occurs during or after enforcement (e.g. seizure or investigation audit) and allows enforcement authorities to ascertain where the pack was manufactured by scanning the track and trace stamp.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size">The WHO Protocol to Eliminate Illicit Trade in Tobacco Products requires country signatories to establish a track and trace system (that is implemented and controlled completely independently from the tobacco industry) for all tobacco products manufactured or imported into their territory. National and/or regional track and trace systems should make information available to a global information sharing focal point. The WHO Protocol to Eliminate Illicit Trade in Tobacco Products requires that, at a minimum, track and trace systems record time, date, location of manufacture, manufacturing facility, intended market for resale and a product description.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"blue","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-blue-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size"><strong>Warning: Codentify is a tobacco industry technology which does not guarantee a product’s legal status</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size">Philip Morris originally developed and promoted Codentify© for tracking and tracing tobacco products and then sold it to INEXTO. The industry’s strategy is “(t)o keep tracking and tracing, authentication, volume control and tax verification under industry control.” The Protocol to Eliminate Illicit Trade in Tobacco Products does not allow for tobacco industry involvement in a track and trace system and Codentify’s origins within the tobacco industry means that it does not meet all standards as set out in the Protocol to Eliminate Illicit Trade in Tobacco Products.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>811</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-15 14:13:03]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-15 14:13:03]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[combating-strengthen-enforcement]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="combating"><![CDATA[Combating]]></category>
		<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="track-trace"><![CDATA[Track & Trace]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1165]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Combating - Investigate and Enforce Criminal and Civil Laws</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/combating-strengthen-enforcement-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 15 Oct 2020 18:49:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=527</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":791,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/combating_icon_a.png" alt="" class="wp-image-791"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-large-font-size"><strong>Investigate and Enforce Criminal and Civil Laws</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center"> In 2014, as a result of SARS investigations, there was a 25% increase in excise and VAT payments from cigarette manufacturers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"light-blue","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-light-blue-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Close investigation of the tobacco industry and strict enforcement is important to control illicit trade.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-intermediate-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-light-blue-color">In 2014, as a result of SARS investigations, there was a 25% increase in excise and VAT payments from cigarette manufacturers. </span></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">“More recently, in South Africa, it was estimated that cigarette manufacturers were flooding the market with up to 12 billion illicit cigarette sticks annually” and action by SARS in sending inspectors to all six manufacturing companies resulted in an estimated additional R10 billion in excise taxes in 2019.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>812</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-15 18:49:38]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-15 18:49:38]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="enforcement"><![CDATA[Enforcement]]></category>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1163]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[combating-strengthen-enforcement]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_oembed_410eb3771ebe464dd70bf1d6e72dfb0e]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<iframe title="BATTLE ROYALE DINOSAURIOS CARNÍVOROS CONTRA HERBÍVOROS JURASSIC WORLD EVOLUTION" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EBYliTwjM4w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1603140994]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Combating - Eliminate</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/combating-eliminate/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 15 Oct 2020 19:19:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=535</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1281,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/eliminate_icon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1281"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-large-font-size"><strong>Eliminate Single Stick Sales</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center">The sale of single sticks severely limits the traceability of packs</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">Single cigarette stick sales are illegal in South Africa although this is not widely enforced.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">“The sale of single sticks severely limits the traceability of packs”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">as even if packs were to have track and trace stamps these would not be evident on single sticks. In South African townships, approximately 60% of smokers buy cigarettes as singles and nationally approximately 30% of cigarettes sales are singles.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1299,"width":553,"height":177,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-full is-resized"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/info_graphic_eliminate.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1299" width="553" height="177"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"full-link","textColor":"green","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="full-link has-green-color has-text-color has-small-font-size"><a href="http://google.com" data-type="URL" data-id="google.com" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>Read full article</strong></a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>813</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-15 19:19:49]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-15 19:19:49]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[combating-eliminate]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="combating"><![CDATA[Combating]]></category>
		<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="eliminate"><![CDATA[Eliminate]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1161]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[combating-strengthen-enforcement]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[combating-track]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Production at illegal facilities</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/type-transits/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 20 Oct 2020 20:25:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=651</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-regular-font-size">Production at illegal facilities</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">Cigarettes and other tobacco products are manufactured at illegal facilities. These cigarettes may not meet health and packaging regulations. <strong>Counterfeit cigarettes </strong>infringe on intellectual property rights. No excise tax or VAT is paid on these products.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"regular"} -->
<p class="has-regular-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-green-color">Production at legal facilities</span> </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size">Under declaring</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-normal-font-size">Manufactures produce more than they report to tax authorities. These cigarettes are sold in South Africa without paying excise duties and VAT. Under-declaring production is a well known tactic used by tobacco producers globally. For instance, “(f)actories in South Africa operate double shifts, running their machines at night, and/or they hide the true scale of their production by paying off customs officials and using fraudulent paperwork. They make use of all the available gaps in SARS’s monitoring of their ‘bond’ warehouses, for example reusing invoices for multiple deliveries.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"dark-gray","fontSize":"intermediate"} -->
<p class="has-dark-gray-color has-text-color has-intermediate-font-size"><span class="has-inline-color has-green-color">Ghost exports</span><br>Manufacturers declare some production for export (therefore exempt from excise duties and VAT). These products are instead diverted to the South African market without paying tax.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>814</wp:post_id>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[type-transits]]></wp:post_name>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>

										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="types-supply"><![CDATA[Types / Tobacco Supply]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[import-2]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[type-transit]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1167]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Messages</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/messages-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 28 Oct 2020 15:13:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=745</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":16} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:16%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1182,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/money_icon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1182"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"compacted","textColor":"light-blue","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="compacted has-light-blue-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Many countries have successfully increased tobacco taxes without illicit trade increasing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":16} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:16%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1183,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/police_icon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1183"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"light-blue","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-light-blue-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Strong enforcement and an independent track and trace system are the most effective way of combating illicit trade.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">This fact sheet defines the various types of illicit tobacco trade in South Africa, discusses the overall level of illicit trade, and presents estimates of the prevalence of illicit trade within South Africa. Finally, myths promulgated by the tobacco industry are examined and addressed, and suggestions for methods to reduce illicit trade presented. Success stories from other countries are also highlighted.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>815</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-28 15:13:54]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-28 15:13:54]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[messages-2]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="messages"><![CDATA[Messages]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[440]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[messages]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>South African government banned all tobacco</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/ensouth-african-government-banned-all-tobacco/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 28 Oct 2020 18:54:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=770</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"gray","fontSize":"tiny"} -->
<p class="has-gray-color has-text-color has-tiny-font-size"><strong> </strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Estimates, by province, of the prevalence of illicit cigarettes were calculated using Wave 5 (2017) of the National Income Dynamics Study, based on the assumption that cigarette packs sold at, or under, 20 Rands (+-USD1.20) are likely to be illicit. These percentages are interpreted to mean that, for example for Western Cape, 24.7% of all cigarette trade in that province is illegal. The percentages noted here are <strong>estimates</strong> of the actual level of illicit trade in each province.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:ai/ai-block {"src":"https://tobacco.dgstg.org/#/en/infographics/map","width":"","height":""} /-->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"right","textColor":"light-blue","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-right has-light-blue-color has-text-color has-small-font-size">See the ‘Impact of COVID-19 lockdown sales ban’ factsheet for more information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>816</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-28 18:54:21]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-28 18:54:21]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[ensouth-african-government-banned-all-tobacco]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[770]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Illicit trade occurs primarily in the townships of South Africa.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/enillicit-trade-occurs-primarily-in-the-townships-of-south-africa/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 04 Nov 2020 12:41:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=1074</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"compacted","textColor":"green","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="compacted has-green-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Buyers of illicit tobacco products can be found throughout the country.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">The size of the illicit tobacco market in townships is similar to the estimated size of the illicit tobacco market nationally. This suggests that “illicit trade is not concentrated in townships, but rather that  it is ubiquitous across South Africa.”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1074</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-11-04 12:41:46]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-11-04 12:41:46]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[enillicit-trade-occurs-primarily-in-the-townships-of-south-africa]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="myths"><![CDATA[Myths]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[increase-in-tax-leads-to-an-increase-in-illicit-trade]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Tobacco industry provides reliable data</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/illicit/increase-in-tax-leads-to-an-increase-in-illicit-trade-3/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 04 Nov 2020 12:41:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=illicit&#038;p=1077</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"className":"compacted","textColor":"green","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="compacted has-green-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Tobacco industry consistently produces unreliable data and frequently fails to state the source or research methodology.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">The tobacco industry consistently produces estimates of the size of illegal tobacco that are higher than estimates in independent research. This is found in South Africa and globally.  “TISA has retrospectively adjusted illicit trade estimates to fit the narrative about the growing danger of illicit trade. For example, in a 2012 presentation to National Treasury, TISA claimed that the 2008 illicit market share was 7.9%, in sharp contrast with its earlier claim (made in 2008 and 2009) that the illicit market share was 20% in that year.”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1077</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-11-04 12:41:24]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-11-04 12:41:24]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[increase-in-tax-leads-to-an-increase-in-illicit-trade-3]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[illicit]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="illicit_category" nicename="myths"><![CDATA[Myths]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_date]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[2020-11-03]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Green Tobacco Sickness can be caused by compost, heat, the smell of the tobacco plants or pesticide.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/green-tobacco-sickness-can-be-caused-by-compost-heat-the-smell-of-the-tobacco-plants-or-pesticide/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 10 Dec 2020 20:38:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1560</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color">Green Tobacco Sickness can be caused by compost, heat, the smell of the tobacco plants or pesticide.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">Nicotine causes Green Tobacco Sickness.<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Working with tobacco for some time allows you to develop a tolerance for Green Tobacco Sickness.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/working-with-tobacco-for-some-time-allows-you-to-develop-a-tolerance-for-green-tobacco-sickness/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 10 Dec 2020 20:40:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1562</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Green Tobacco Sickness can be caused by compost, heat, the smell of the tobacco plants or pesticide.. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">There is no evidence you can build up a tolerance.<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Green Tobacco Sickness can be caused by compost, heat, the smell of the tobacco plants or pesticide. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">There is no evidence you can build up a tolerance.<br></p>

					<item>
		<title>Smoking gives you protection from Green Tobacco Sickness.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/smoking-gives-you-protection-from-green-tobacco-sickness/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 10 Dec 2020 20:43:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1568</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color">Smoking gives you protection from Green Tobacco Sickness..</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">Smoking provides <strong>NO</strong> protection from Green Tobacco Sickness and it is harmful to your health.<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1568</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-10 20:43:59]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-10 20:43:59]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[smoking-gives-you-protection-from-green-tobacco-sickness]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="health_category" nicename="agriculture-myths"><![CDATA[Agriculture Myths]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_date]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[2020-12-04]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inline_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>E-cigarette aerosol is NOT harmless “water vapor.”</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/e-cigarette-aerosol-is-not-harmless-water-vapor/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 11 Dec 2020 12:13:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/?post_type=health&#038;p=1574</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":46.5} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:46.5%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1587,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/ecig_graphic.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1587"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":10} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":66.66} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size"><strong>E-cigarette aerosol is NOT harmless “water vapor.”</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"width":10} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1731,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/lungs-1.png" alt="lungs icon" class="wp-image-1731"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":66.66} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size"><strong>The e-cigarette aerosol that users breathe from the<br>device may contain harmful, and potentially harmful substances, including: nicotine, ultrafine particles that can be inhaled deep into the lungs, flavorings such as diacetyl, a chemical linked to a serious lung disease, volatile organic compounds, cancer-causing chemicals, and heavy metals such as nickel, tin, and lead.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"width":10} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1733,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/brain2.png" alt="brain icon" class="wp-image-1733"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":66.66} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size"><strong>The uptake of electronic cigarettes by adolescents and young adults is a growing public health concern globally. Most electronic cigarettes contain nicotine which can be harmful to brain development.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"width":10} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1585,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/heart.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1585"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":66.66} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size"><strong>E-cigarettes are a new product and their long term effects are unknown. More research needs to be done on the short and long term health effects on electronic cigarettes.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"tight"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns tight"><!-- wp:column {"width":10} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1586,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-large"><img src="https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/novape.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1586"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":66.66} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size"><strong>The sale/distribution of e-cigarettes is banned in 41 countries globally, including 4 African countries: Ethiopia, Gambia, Mauritius, and Uganda</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1574</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-11 12:13:13]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-11 12:13:13]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[e-cigarette-aerosol-is-not-harmless-water-vapor]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[health]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="health_category" nicename="impact"><![CDATA[Impact]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inline_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[0]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Hookah (also known as hubbly-bubbly) is harmless because water purifies the smoke.</title>
		<link>https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/health/hookah-also-known-as-hubbly-bubbly-is-harmless-because-water-purifies-the-smoke/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 11 Dec 2020 18:26:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://wp.tobacco.dgstg.org/?post_type=health&#038;p=1628</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">&nbsp;Hookah (also known as hubbly-bubbly) is harmless because water purifies the smoke.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">A one hour hookah session is the equivalent of smoking 100 cigarettes. Hookah smokers inhale smoke that has been cooled by water. This makes it easy to inhale - even for first time smokers. Water does not purify or filter the smoke.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"red","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-red-color has-text-color has-normal-font-size">Hookah (also known as hubbly-bubbly) is harmless because water purifies the smoke.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:more -->
<!--more-->
<!-- /wp:more -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"green","fontSize":"intermediate-plus"} -->
<p class="has-green-color has-text-color has-intermediate-plus-font-size">A one hour hookah session is the equivalent of smoking 100 cigarettes. Hookah smokers inhale smoke that has been cooled by water. This makes it easy to inhale - even for first time smokers. Water does not purify or filter the smoke.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1628</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-12-11 18:26:27]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-12-11 18:26:27]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
